recommendation_metadata.notes: Comprehensive Analytics Insights navigation structure provides integrated view of all analytical capabilities with 7-dimension framework applied consistently across OSA, Content, Audiences, CX, and Other sections. AI-driven optimization recommendations with personalized insights based on business context, analytics maturity, and strategic objectives.
microservice_dependencies: All 10 OSA microservices integrated with specific dimension mappings
Real-time data processing through Event Bus and Monitoring Service
AI-powered insights through Recommendation Service and Conversational Analytics
Business alignment through Strategy Intake and Preferences Policy services

Configure real-time data processing and update frequencies
